DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effect treatment PulseHaler™ patient COPD , measure change baseline full pulmonary function , oxygen saturation , exercise tolerance health relate quality life ; assess ease use PulseHaler™ patient .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Treatment With PulseHaler Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD Diagnosis establish least 1 year ; Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.7 Post bronchodilator FEV1 < 70 % predicted Age : 40 year old Smoking cigarette , least 10PY Patient sign informed consent form Bullous Emphysema ( rule recent CT ) Hospitalization due exacerbation COPD within last 3 month Upper respiratory infection and/or exacerbation COPD last 4 week Systemic steroid treatment last 4 week Women age fertility , pregnant , plan pregnancy , use contraceptive . Severe cardiac disease , e.g. , CHF grade 3 high Acute MI within last 3 month CABG within last 3 month Other severe systemic disease
